title: ikko navanItacOra
sahitya:
ikko navanItacOra sikkidanamma hemmakkaLellaru kUDi nammakkara dIrisikomba


caraNam 1    andu modalAgi namma mandiragaLella pokku tinda mIsala 
beNNe tande mADi pOdanakka bahu tande mADi pOdanakka
    caraNam 2    kADhadindalivana heDe muDiya bigidu kaTTi Odi hOdare 
sikka kiDi gEDi rangana biDabEDi kiDi gEDi krSNana biDabEDi
    caraNam 3    yAru illada vELeyali dAriya nODuttaliva sure mADuva 
hAlu mosaru cOra rangana biDa bEDire dhIra krSNana biDa bEDire
    caraNam 4    kaNDanillada vELe nODi bhaNDu mADi sIre kaddu koNdu hAlu 
keneya kadda laNDa rangana biDa bEDire puNDa krSNana biDa bEDire
    caraNam 5    kAdu koNDiva bAho hAdiya nODi nA daNide Adudemmeya 
kAma sAdhisi komba krOdha sAdhisi komba
    caraNam 6    oraLili kaTTisi koNDu oraLa koNDoDuvaninda maruLu mADi 
hOdanamma bahu mOsa mADi hOdanamma duruLa krSNana biDa bEDi
    caraNam 7    indina dina sudina mandaradhara toreda kAraNa tande 
purandara viTTalanna appikomba santOSadinda appi komba
